name: sship
description: The ultimate SSH companion tool with built-in Synergy (SFTP) file transfer.

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target=node --external ssh2 --external ssh2-sftp-client && mkdir -p dist/public && cp src/transfer/public/* dist/public/
scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint
scripts.test:integration: BUN_TMPDIR=/tmp bun test ./tests/tunnelStorage.integration.ts && BUN_TMPDIR=/tmp bun test ./tests/serversCommand.integration.ts && BUN_TMPDIR=/tmp bun test ./tests/sshConfig.integration.ts && BUN_TMPDIR=/tmp bun test ./tests/scriptPath.integration.ts
scripts.test:smoke: BUN_TMPDIR=/tmp bun run build && BUN_TMPDIR=/tmp bun test ./tests/smoke.cli.smoke.ts
scripts.test:all: BUN_TMPDIR=/tmp bun test && BUN_TMPDIR=/tmp bun test ./tests/tunnelStorage.integration.ts && BUN_TMPDIR=/tmp bun test ./tests/serversCommand.integration.ts && BUN_TMPDIR=/tmp bun test ./tests/sshConfig.integration.ts && BUN_TMPDIR=/tmp bun test ./tests/scriptPath.integration.ts && BUN_TMPDIR=/tmp bun run build && BUN_TMPDIR=/tmp bun test ./tests/smoke.cli.smoke.ts
scripts.test:phase-regression: BUN_TMPDIR=/tmp bun run build && BUN_TMPDIR=/tmp bun test ./tests/smoke.cli.smoke.ts ./tests/backupCommand.test.ts ./tests/restoreCommand.test.ts ./tests/initCommand.integration.ts ./tests/logsCommand.integration.ts
